name: One Shota Summer Vacation
description:
It's an RPG where you can become a boy "Yu" and make naughty summer memories with your sister and villagers.
You will spend one month of summer vacation.
I tried to animate the etch scene for the time being, there are a lot of stiff movements.

The targets of capture are 6 older sisters, 2 older sisters, 2 mothers, married women, female doctors, and teachers.
A branch ED is prepared for each.

There are 43 flashback scenes
The total number of images exceeds 2000 !!!! (It is not very helpful because it includes animations.)
